BUSINESS AFFAIRS
November 8, 1957
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
N.A.E.B.
lb Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Hill:
At Keith Neighbert's suggestion I am writing
to ask you for any information you may have as a
result of tbaKsearch on types of television sets
most desirable for classroom use.
Thank you for any assistance you may give us.
Sincerely yours,
Helen Lochrie
TV Coordinator
